descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was collected to develop a language model for my final year project.


### Content

It contains 417,808 news samples including the date, title, and category.


### Source

www.bdnews24.com [Copyright owned by the actual source]


### Inspiration

This corpus can be used for news classification, language modeling, text generation etc. Also, you can use this if you want to annotate datasets for tasks like Relation Extraction, NER, POS tagging etc.
title: bdnews24 bangla news corpus
subtitle: 417,808 bengali news scraped from bdnews24.com
description:
### Context

This dataset was collected to develop a language model for my final year project.


### Content

It contains 417,808 news samples including the date, title, and category.


### Source

www.bdnews24.com [Copyright owned by the actual source]


### Inspiration

This corpus can be used for news classification, language modeling, text generation etc. Also, you can use this if you want to annotate datasets for tasks like Relation Extraction, NER, POS tagging etc.
